title: Court Rules In Favor Of ABSA Bank In Withholding Tax Dispute Against KRA
description: The Supreme Court stressed that the Commissioner of Income Tax, the respondent in the appeal, assessed and demanded withholding tax from Barclays Bank Kenya
content:
The Supreme Court on December 5, 2025, ruled that fees banks pay to card companies are not royalties and are therefore not subject to taxation, a win for Kenya’s banking fraternity.
